official_title: A bill to authorize Federal agencies to lease space for and otherwise assist in the establishment of day care center facilities for the children of their employees.

summary.text: Authorizes the head of each Federal agency to establish, equip, and operate a day care center for the children under seven years old of employees of such agency. Sets forth restrictions on the funding of such centers. Repeals the provision of the Education Amendments of 1976 which authorized the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to establish and operate day care centers for children of Department employees.

titles.title: A bill to authorize Federal agencies to lease space for and otherwise assist in the establishment of day care center facilities for the children of their employees.
